title: Its the 5th Consecutive Listing for Upside Learning in Training Industrys Learning Portal Watch List
text:
Its the 5th Consecutive Listing for Upside Learning in Training Industrys Learning Portal Watch List
Upside Learning has been selected as a 2015 Learning Portal Watch List Company by Training Industry Inc. This marks Upside Learnings listing in the prestigious watch list for its best value, responsive LMS  UpsideLMS for the 5th year in a row.
Pune, India, August 30, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Upside Learning is renowned the world over for its learning technology solutions. UpsideLMS, its best value, responsive Learning Management System, is one of the many solutions that the 11+ year old company offers. It is for this multi award-winning LMS that the company has been featured in Training Industry’s Learning Portal Watch List for the 5 consecutive year.
UpsideLMS helps organizations to deliver and manage their company-wide, multi-location learning and performance improvement programs. A perfect mix of traditional learning management features with an innovative edge, UpsideLMS offers a very high level of scalability due to its technical design and architecture. It has been designed to not only address business needs of an SMB but also to scale up to the needs of Enterprise-scale organizations. Its modular and multi-tenant architecture makes it easy for Training Companies to manage multiple customers including retail ones on the same system. Today, over 90 organizations worldwide trust UpsideLMS to deliver training to more than 750,000 learners.
Selection to this years Learning Portal Companies Watch List was based on the following criteria:
• New and innovative service
• Unique approach to delivering learning solutions
• Commitment to improving learning through technology
• Quality of initial clients
“This year’s Learning Portal Companies Watch List features a group of learning technology companies that can be the foundation of a custom learning solution,” said Ken Taylor, President, Training Industry, Inc. “The companies selected have the potential to become leaders in the learning technologies market through their innovation and understanding of adult learning and development.”
Amit Gautam, Director of Technology Solutions and Co-founder of Upside Learning, said, “The changing and growing LMS market demands delivery of training/performance support across all devices along with the ability to address all the mediums of learning seamlessly. At Upside Learning, we are consistently addressing both these demands as we continue to invest in UpsideLMS. Training Industry’s recent recognition highlights our platform’s robustness and innovative features.”
The 2015 Learning Portal Watch List is available for viewing here – http://www.trainingindustry.com/learning-technologies/top-companies-listings/2015/2015-learning-portal-companies-watch-list.aspx
